00011 #include "LatticeSystem.h"    // class header
00012 #include <util/global.h>      // uses UTIL_THROW
00013 
00014 namespace Util
00015 {
00016 
00017    /* 
00018    * Extract a LatticeSystem from an istream as a string.
00019    */
00020    std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& in, LatticeSystem& lattice)
00021    {
00022       std::string buffer;
00023       in >> buffer;
00024       if (buffer == "Cubic" || buffer == "cubic") {
00025          lattice = Cubic;
00026       } else 
00027       if (buffer == "Tetragonal" || buffer == "tetragonal") {
00028          lattice = Tetragonal;
00029       } else 
00030       if (buffer == "Orthorhombic" || buffer == "orthorhombic") {
00031          lattice = Orthorhombic;
00032       } else 
00033       if (buffer == "Monoclinic" || buffer == "monoclinic") {
00034          lattice = Monoclinic; 
00035       } else 
00036       if (buffer == "Triclinic" || buffer == "triclinic") {
00037          lattice = Triclinic; 
00038       } else 
00039       if (buffer == "Rhombohedral" || buffer == "rhombohedral") {
00040          lattice = Rhombohedral;
00041       } else 
00042       if (buffer == "Hexagonal" || buffer == "hexagonal") {
00043          lattice = Hexagonal; 
00044       } else {
00045          #ifndef UTIL_MPI
00046          Log::file() << "Unknown LatticeSystem: " << buffer << std::endl;
00047          #endif
00048          UTIL_THROW("Invalid LatticeSystem value input");
00049       }
00050       return in;
00051    }
00052    
00053    /* 
00054    * Insert a LatticeSystem to an ostream as a string.
00055    */
00056    std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, LatticeSystem lattice) 
00057    {
00058       if (lattice == Cubic) {
00059          out << "cubic";
00060       } else 
00061       if (lattice == Tetragonal) {
00062          out << "tetragonal";
00063       } else
00064       if (lattice == Orthorhombic) {
00065          out << "orthorhombic";
00066       } else
00067       if (lattice == Monoclinic) {
00068          out << "monoclinic";
00069       } else
00070       if (lattice == Triclinic) {
00071          out << "triclinic";
00072       } else
00073       if (lattice == Rhombohedral) {
00074          out << "rhombohedral";
00075       } else
00076       if (lattice == Hexagonal) {
00077          out << "hexagonal";
00078       } else {
00079          UTIL_THROW("This should never happen");
00080       } 
00081       return out; 
00082    }

00090    bool MpiTraits<Util::LatticeSystem>::hasType = true;
00091 
00092    #endif

00094 }
